Title: Precious Lights Pre-School Auction
Plot: Having trouble letting go of his leadership position, Ron and Henry clash at a fundraiser where parents will do anything to get their kids into an exclusive elementary school.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
Writer: John Enbom, Rob Thomas, Dan Etheridge
GuestStars: J.K. Simmons, Andrea Savage, Joey Lauren Adams, Aviva Baumann, Meagen Fay
